scripts.build-css: node-sass --include scss scss/style.scss style.css && node-sass --include scss scss/FaleConosco.scss style/faleconosco.css && node-sass --include scss scss/parceiros.scss style/parceiros.css && node-sass --include scss scss/quemsomos.scss style/quemsomos.css && node-sass --include scss scss/servicos.scss style/servicos.css
